item.title: Trump moves on D.C. golf courses with notice to nonprofit
item.description: The administration puts National Links Trust on the clock in a bid to take control of the city’s three public golf courses.

item.title: Donald Trump is known for firing people. But not this year.

item.title: Trump called her ‘garbage.’ Rep. Ilhan Omar says she remains unfazed.
item.description: “There’s this creepy obsession that he seems to have on me that just feels pretty obnoxious,” the Minnesota Democrat said of the president.
